title: Topdeck Travel targets UK agents
text:
Topdeck Travel targets UK agents 24 July 2015 Save 
Topdeck Travel is introducing a new Asian programme as it increasingly targets the UK market. 
The youth escorted tour operator has appointed Janine Salame as new general manager for UK, Europs and South Africa after spending 15 years at Flight Centre South Africa. 
And she is confident the new far eastern programme, which goes on sale in November with up to eight itineraries including skiing in Japan and a Vietnam tour, will help kick start the growth. 
Salame said: “It is very exciting product and we believe it will be very popular in the UK market. 
“We’ve had a lot of customer feedback in terms of our product to learn what they want to see more of. We’ve been doing quite a lot of research.” 
She added to achieve the sales growth she is looking for, she is hoping to work with even more agents who currently account for about 60% of the operator’s total sales. 
Salame said: “We believe we can grow the agency relationships within the UK, Europe and South Africa.” 
She added to ensure the operator was working with more agents, she was looking to recruit between two and four additional business development managers to join the six-strong team currently in place. 
“It’s really exciting,” she said. “There’s room to aggressively grow the brand within the UK market.” 
Salame added Topdeck was also planning a social media campaign to highlight the fun to be had on a coach holiday. 
She said: “Collectively we will carve out an unparalleled offering that will tackle the perception of coach travel and provide young travel fans with inspirational trips. 
“Topdeck’s offering already speaks to young travellers seeking adventure - our mission is to further inspire growth and widespread Topdeck brand awareness in Europe by making the brand not only relevant, but exciting across every single touchpoint. 
“I think there is incredible opportunities to drive relevance, while exciting and engaging our fans via integrated campaigns. 
“The Topdeck story is visual and about making travel dreams come true; social media is pivotal in positioning our tailored products to a young, savvy and always-on audience.”
